title: Vegan tomato soup
ingredients: ['1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (450g) tin tomatoes (chopped or whole)', '1 (1L) carton tomato juice', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 teaspoon basil', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 teaspoon parsley', '2 to 3 bay leaves', 'a good pinch black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
